amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for International Military Education and Training by $1.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 30 in the Congressional Record of June 4, 1996 to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Intern ational Education and Training by $1,525,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 181 (Roll no. 216).
